text:
Hi, the extension m4u, see http://www.iana.org/assignments/media-types/video/vnd-mpegurl, should be added to the line 

video/vnd.mpegurl mxu in mime.types and mime.types-dist in Apache 1.3 and 2.0.

It should be

video/vnd.mpegurl mxu m4u

m4u was registered at IANA too, I had forgotten this when I asked to include audio/x-mpegurl m3u and video/vnd.mpegurl mxu some time ago, thanks! ;-), and now there is an important player now that supports at least m4u, it must be cleared now,

Thanks again!


Heiko
creator: uzs106@b.lab.net

text: Now finally committed to all three versions currently in development. Thanks.
creator: erik@codefaktor.de
